Blog.post: Yo. To explain the title, my dog Skruphi is usually really hyper and playful & now she's wierd... like... calm. Oh well. Neways, I'm kinda nervous cuse my mom was spossed to be out of surgery like 30 min.s ago, and I haven't heard ne thing. :{ Ok, weell, G2G cuse I can't think of ne thing else to say. Byeas! Bek

Aloha Amigos, sorry 4 d wierd title, but it was all I could think of! Today I tried to get Devin to spend the night, but she couldn't, so I spent the night with Libbie. I have to b home @ 10 am, but I'm kinda glad cuse I want to see my mom be4 she goes into surgery on her shoulder. I'm seriosly thinking about hurting Heath so bad, cuse he is so annoying hitting me in the boobs all the time & talking about women, them having babies, and boobs. I mean, he's only like, what, 8? 9? ARGGG! He shouldn't be flirting with 13 yr olds! He shouldn't be flirting with me, he shouldn't be flirting with ne one! JEEZ! The only things keeping me in that class are: 1) Devin 2) Dustin 3) Libbie 4) My mom! ARGG! I wish I could drop that class like in school! No, wait. I like Tae Kwon Do. I wish Heath would drop it! (takes deep breath) Ok. I'm fine. Here's part of 1 of my fave songs, Big Fish: Doogididum Digadumdumdadum doogididogadadio doogididumdumdadum doogididumdadidadumdao Are you in the Big Fish, sittin in the belly of a world gone mad have you turned your back on his wish, his will for your life, have you made him sad? Do you wanna get out of the Big Fish, listen to God and follow his commands, And you won't be part of the Main Dish, he'll spit you out on the dry land! Doogididum ... Your sinkin low, how low can ya go, so low that you don't know which way to go, To the truth or to the dare, To the dare and you'll be swallowed there, But to the truth and you will find that a rescuer is right in time To pick you up back on your feet, Obediance is neat! Doogididum ... Oh well, that's it for now, G2G eat some blue ice cream! Bek

Hello all u Conrads! Sorry 4 d short post last night, but I hade 2 start out w/ something! Ya know, I really don't think I'm going 2 tell Libbie about my blog, cuse I'm going 2 put something on here that I don't want her 2 know cuse she'll tease me about it. So I'll put it on here cuse I gotta tell someone or I shall burst! OK, I'm in tae kwon do, right? And I just realized, (oh wait, Devin, don't tell ne 1 about this, and don't tease me, or I will spar your head off!(Since I am 2 belts higher than you!)) Neways, I just realized last night that...DUNDUNDA... I have a HUGE crush in Dustin! Dude, Devin if u tell NEONE about this, ESPECIALLY LIBBIE, I will Stepping- Side- Kick your butt to Uranus! (note the planet:)) But seriosly, you will hurt so bad if I find out you told LIBBIE OR DUSTIN or ne one else about my secret or the address of my blog! G2G, Bek
Hey all u coolio peeps! This has got 2 be short b4 I get caught, but this is a little about me! I have 6 pets! more l8r, I just heeard a door open! G2G! Bek
Grounded for a week. Byeas!
Hello.

Only people who have read The Pearl will know why that title is tere. Hello. I'm writing tiny! hehe. If you can read Webdings, then you are lucky and can read what I just wrote. My favorite reality show (I really don'twatch them, but this one is cool) is Last Comic Standing. And my computer doesn't like me and no one ever im's or e's me.

Purple font is cool. But purple bold font is better. Hey Ya'll! I'm soo glad Devin is back, even if it's only for a week. I hope she can go to Whitewater, cus ethe only other person I know of that's going is Jill, which probably means Kristy is going and I really don't know that I want to hang out with her all day. I HOPE DEVIN AND SAM GO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! SAM, IF YOU ARE READING THIS I AM GOING TO CALL YOU AS SOON AS MY MOM GETS OF THE PHONE CUSE I'VE BEEN TRYING TO CALL YOU SICE I GOT HOME FROM TAE KWON DO AND THE LINE IS BUSY! Ok, I'm ok now. Hey, has ne one noticed that I'm writing backwards? I thought that was cool. ne ways, I gotta go call Sammy! Byeas! Bek P.S. gag gag gag gag gag gag gag gag gag this is all the fonts!

Hello, people of the net! I am using Webdings, A strange font the you can't read and it is blue. I will stop now. goodbye. That was: Hello people of the net! I am using a strange font called Webdings and it is blue. I will stop now. Goodbye. Yo peeps! Hey Sam if ur reading this! I met this guy on the net today and he's from Nigeria! As in AFRICA! And he speaks english! I thought that was totally osm! And... guess what his name is! Come on, guess! France! That's his name! I thought that was osm! Ne ways, he has a doberman named Jack. At least I think that was him. Oh well, maybe not. But he's cool neways! G2G check Dev, Deb, and Libs's bblogs! Byeas! Bek

Kyung Yet to me, Minors! Pay Chariot! Sa Bum Nim! Sa Bum Nim Ke Kyung Yet! That's me, Minors! Kook Ki! Kook Ki E Kyung Yet! Don't make me Kiyop at you! Kam Sa Ham Nee Da! Soo Ryun Kut! Yo, pees! I'll translate what I just said. (It's Korean): Bow (to me, Minors! Pay) Attention! Master Instructor! Bow to the Master Instructor! (That's me, Minors!) Flag! Bow to the Flag! (Don't make me) Yell (at you!) Thank You! Class Dismissed! I'M SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO BORED! I've done just about everything you can do in a town called Yellow! At least I don't live in Pink, OK. It must be the most boring place ever! (of course, you could stand in the middle of the street and yell about how stupid the name is.)But my mom won't let me do that! I've colored, read, watched tv, eaten, played with the dogs, listened to a fly, and tried to communacate with my stuffed animals! All I got was . They lead an interesting life! I've screamed with my bird, typed one handed, and even Blogged! I've been yell at by Libbie, Ignored by Rickay, Sam, and Devin, answered the door, bugged my parents, tried to communicate with my Granny, (answered by a babble of stupid stuff), and memorized the song from the George Forman Alaska commercial that comes on every commercial break. I've picked the sticker of the phone, read all the signs on our house, played computer games, re-memorized A Leader is Best, gotten scratched by my house, and, finally, held a staring contest with a frog! (which I lost, frogs don't blink) Ne ways, I'm gonna re-create my avater! Byeas, Bek

Hey, sorry I haven't posted in a while, But I went to Witchita Falls. To explain title, My bird ate my mom's cereal. I got this wierd IM today from this guy that said Yahoo!Personals had paired us together like a dating service or something. I didn't even known I hade done that Personals thingymagig. Oh well, if he IMs back, I'll ask him about it. Jeez, i'm really tired. I might go see Collin soon. (That's my baby god-brother) That's where my mom is. I'm gonna make like Skruphi, Smiley, Reese's, and Calvin and go conk out watchin tv. O BTW, I downloaded Yahoo!Messenger,so IM me, becca.king@sbcglobal.net.Maybe I'll put you on my buddy list, who knows? Well, byeas! Bek [-) (sleepin smiley)

EEHEHE!!! Holando all you peeps! To explain funky title, my aunt's dog Fuzball, Furball, Kujo, Zues, or whatever you want to call him, he was sitting on the top of the couch with his butt on Devin's shoulder and Devin goes, "I guess he's reading too!" Cuse she was reading this story she wrote and she looked out the corner of her eye and said that and then she realized it was his butt, not his face! EEHEHE!! Ok, neways, I'll explain why I haven't been posting for a while. I was in Witchita Falls,Tx visiting my aunt and all my friends down there and my aunt has no computer, so there you see the problem. Newaays, I'msitting here by my fish, Moby Dick, that I gave away a few weeks ago. Now isn't that interesting! Okee dope, I gotta go find something to eat or drink in this horrid place! Byeas! Bek

(in mellow tone) Hello, fellow flowers, today I will be telling you why this blog is called 'I Love Daisy Cake'. You see, fellow flowers, my mother (ok that's enuff, no more mellow tones) ne ways, my momgot these muffin things shaped like flowers and she made cake and it's good. IT'S GOOOD. Neways, Deb's dress was really short today but it's ok, I understand. Ne ways, Dev gets back tomarrow, (yea), and no Tae Kwon Do tomarrow, (yea), and fire is cool, works are cool, but fireworks are OSM!! Oh YEA!!! Everyone watch tonight!!!! Cuse like I said earlier, fire is cool, works are cool, but fireworks are OSM!! Oh YEA!!! But it looks like I'll be watching from my yard while all you get to go to the park cuse my stupid mother 'doesn't like the dent you get when you go!!!' !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! AAAAAARRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I have to go, I'm about to break the keyboard, I'm so mad at her cuse we were going, but noooooooo, she doesn't want to!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Bek P.S.: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Hola! To explain the title, That's all the names of my dogs and my dad was bathing them and he said that when he told me to give him one of the dogs to bathe. I just wanna let ya'llknow that the internet is wierd cuse wierd people use it! (yes, me included) WELL, G2G, Bek

Yo dudetes! To explain the title, Mr. Trotter (my Tae Kwon Do instructer) told my mom that he felt really really really bad about my arm cuse he told me 2 kick & he says I did this beautiful, beautiful axe kick, and I slipped & lost my balance & fell & he just felt terrible. Well, I gotta go take Smiley out to poo, so, see ya l8r! Bek

Hey sorry for the wierd title but that cheer is stuck in my head. OWWWWWWWW Devin, Libbie, IT HUUUUURTS! Sorry other peeps if ur there, but we started sparring in tae kwon do today & I was sparring against Dustin (ok, so my crush on him isn't huge, but it's there) and he caught me in the elbow (I broke it last spring skiing, long story later)and then Mr. Trotter (our instructer) told me to axe kick him since he's shorter then I am (he's half way up my nose) so I did & lost my balance and fell on my elbow that Dustin hade just kicked like 30 sec.s earlier (yes, the just healed one) and I have this HUGE bruise and I scraped it pretty bad. Oh well, I got Dustin back for kicking me in the elbow, I caught him where it hurts a few times accedintly. BTW, my mom is fine, my dad just didn't bother to call me when she got out. OBTW, Libs, my mom wonders how someone sooo iritating can be so lovable. :) Devin, have fun @ home! See ya ummm later! O, and for all you people who care... BECKY IS HERE!!!!! I love my aunt Becky! She's sooooooooooooooooooooooo osm!!!!! G2G!!!! Bek (Becca, Becky, see the connection? yea.)

look i blogged
hi. no capatalizing today. short post. libs may be comin over.

Hey. I'm sooo tired, but I'll tell ya'll about Devin tellin her secret. We were shoppping with my aunt Dee Ann for Devin and Angel and Devin was tellin her about how she was going to move in with her dad next year. She went to throw away a piece of trash and I told Dee Ann that Dev really needed to move in with her dad cuse of crap with her stepdad & Dee was like, "I she trying something Devin?" and she thought for a little while and finally said, "Yea..." and told her in the middle of the shampoo isle in Wally World (Wal-Mart). Ne ways, g2g Bek

YAYAYAYAYA!!!! DEVIN TOLD DEVIN TOLD!!!!!!! I'm so glad for her that she finally opened up to my aunt Dee Ann and my mom. The police officer is her and asking me to talk to him with Devin, so I gotta go! Libs and Deb: CALL ME!!!!
